name: Time to think
description:
Inspired by IRL "pre-mortem" practice.

  • Click on the box to think about it.
    • White: task
    • Yellow: problems
    • Cyan-ish: solutions
  • More details and counters can come up with deliberation.
The simulation phase didn’t make it in time and the stats are kinda useless, sorry about that.

Meanwhile, most of the fun comes from adding mods/dlc/whatevs and then digging through them.

Checkout out the stuff directory. The game will load up and combine every .yaml in there.

You can have tasks, problems in solutions in one file, or split it in multiple. All fields are mandatory. Even the stats, yes, for the big post-jam DLC with simulation working.

Send pastebin links with your epic yamls.
